page.title: 01ROUND AND ABOUT DENHOLME
page.content:
A general view reveals 4 reservoirs, open moorland, rough grazing and several farms.
The village of{Denholme}(population : approx.3,000) is the main centre of habitation.{Denholme Clough}was an equally well established community until the woollen industry came to Denholme in l830. The village then grew rapidly but changed little until the l930 when a new wave of building, both corporation and private, began, mainly for commuters to Bradford and Keighley, and is gradually continuing. There is a small shopping area and some industry.
{Keelham,}a hamlet at a cross roads and {Leeming}, on the outskirts of Oxenhope (0335) have changed little in the last 150 years.
